#summary All the default parameters for the different Lemon-Tree tasks.

== ganesh task ==


||Parameter|| Default value || Description ||
||lambda || 0.1 || normal-gamma prior parameter [see eq. (1) in [http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/24/2/176.long this paper]]||
||alpha || 0.1 || normal-gamma prior (see eq. (1) in [http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/24/2/176.long this paper])||
||beta || 0.1 || normal-gamma prior (see eq. (1) in [http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/24/2/176.long this paper])||
||mu || 0.0 || normal-gamma prior (see eq. (1) in [http://bioinformatics.oxfordjournals.org/content/24/2/176.long this paper])||
||init_num_clust || 1/2 nb of genes in data matrix || initial number of clusters||
||num_steps|| 100 || nb of steps for Gibbs sampling procedure||
||burn_in|| 50 || nb of steps for the Gibbs sampling procedure which are not sampled||
||sample_steps|| 100 || sampling steps for the Gibbs sampling procedure||
|| score_gain|| 0.0 || score gain parameter for the Gibbs sampling||

== tight_clusters task ==

||Parameter|| Default value || Description ||
||node_clustering|| true || choose between node (true) or edge (false) clustering procedures to create the tight clusters||
|| min_weight || 0.25 || minimum weight for node or edge clustering procedure||
|| min_clust_size || 10 || minimal cluster size for node or edge clustering procedure||
|| min_clust_score || 2 || minimal cluster score for node or edge clustering procedure||

== regulators task ==

||Parameter|| Default value || Description ||
||lambda || 0.1 || lambda parameter of the bayesian inference model (clustering of conditions)||
||alpha || 0.1 || alpha parameter of the bayesian inference model (clustering of conditions)||
||beta || 0.1 || beta parameter of the bayesian inference model (clustering of conditions)||
||mu || 0.0 || mu parameter of the bayesian inference model (clustering of conditions)||
||num_steps|| 1100 || nb of steps for Gibbs sampling procedure (clustering of conditions)||
||burn_in|| 100 || nb of steps for the Gibbs sampling procedure which are not sampled (clustering of conditions)||
||sample_steps|| 100 || sampling steps for the Gibbs sampling procedure (clustering of conditions)||
|| score_gain|| 0.0 || score gain parameter for the Gibbs sampling (clustering of conditions)||
|| num_reg|| 10 || Number of regulators assigned per leaf node||

== go_annotation task ==
||Parameter|| Default value || Description ||
||go_p_value || 0.05 || GO p-value cutoff level||
||go_namespace || biological_process|| default namespace for enrichment calculations||

== figures task ==
||Parameter|| Default value || Description ||
||use_global_mean||false|| Use the global mean for the color gradient in the figures||
||use_regulator_mean||false || Use the regulator mean for the color gradient in the figures||
||cut_level|| 0 || Cut the regulation tree at a given depth for the figures (0 means no cutting)||
